greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of the sum of the reciprocals of the Enneagonal or Nonagonal numbers (A001106).
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: Equals (2*log(14) + 4*(cos(Pi/7)*log(cos(3*Pi/14)) + log(sin(Pi/7))*sin(Pi/14) - log(cos(Pi/14)) * sin(3*Pi/14)) + Pi*tan(3*Pi/14))/5. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jul 04 2014
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 03 2014
